name: INTERNET_DOMAIN_NAME
description: The organization's Internet domain name

name: VALIDATE_CORPORATE_EMAIL
description: Whether to validate that Admin or Ops user is created with a corporate email

name: DEF_ENTRUST_RET_GRP
description: Default retail user entrust group

name: DEF_ENTRUST_CORP_GRP
description: Default Corporate Entrust Group

name: DEF_ENTRUST_OPS_GRP
description: Default Operations Entrust Group

name: DEF_ENTRUST_ADM_GRP
description: Default Admin Entrust Group

name: ENABLE_CRON_JOB
description: Start the batch job

name: DEFAULT_RETAIL_ROLE
description: Role for retail users at creation

name: RETRY_FAILED_TRANSFER
description: Allow a failed transfer to be tried again

name: LOGIN_ALERT
description: Enable login alerts

name: ACCOUNT_FOR_DEBIT
description: Accounts that cannot be deleted

name: ADMIN_IP_WHITELIST
description: The Range of IP addresses required for Admin Access

name: PASSWORD_REUSE
description: Number of password changes before a password can be reused

name: PASSWORD_AUTO_RESET
description: The number of days before the system prompts the user to change password

name: SESSION_TIMEOUT
description: The time in minutes before a user is automatically logged out

name: LOCK_OUT_DURATION
description: The time in minutes during which a user will wait to retry login after maximum failed login attempts

name: MAX_FAILED_LOGIN_TRIALS
description: The number of times a login attempt fails before the system blocks further login

name: ADMIN_USER_DEACTIVATION
description: The number of days  after last login an admin console user will be automatically deactivated

name: ENABLE_OPS_2FA
description: Whether to enable Two-Factor authentication for Operations users

name: ENABLE_ENTRUST_CREATION
description: Whether to create users on Entrust

name: ENABLE_ENTRUST_DELETION
description: Whether to delete users on Entrust

name: ENABLE_ADMIN_2FA
description: Whether to enable Two-Factor authentication for Admin users

name: CUSTOMER_CARE_EMAIL
description: Customer care Email address

name: ACCOUNT_BALANCE_VALIDATION
description: Whether to validate a transfer agianst the account balance

name: ENABLE_RETAIL_2FA
description: Whether to enable Two-Factor authentication for Retail users

name: ENABLE_CORPORATE_2FA
description: Whether to enable Two-Factor authentication for Corporate users

name: MIN_AUTHORIZER_LEVEL
description: Minimum number of authorizer levels required to for a transaction rule

name: PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH
description: Minimum length of passsword required

name: PASSWORD_SPECIAL_CHARS
description: Special characters allowed in password

name: PASSWORD_NUM_DIGITS
description: Minimum number of digits required in password

name: PASSWORD_EXPIRY
description: The validity days of a new password entered by the user

name: PASSWORD_NUM_SPECIAL_CHARS
description: Number of special characters required

name: SOLE_CORPORATE_ROLE
description: Default role for corporate user

name: ENABLE_UNIQUE_ACCOUNTS
description: Whether to enable unique accounts on creation of corporate entities

name: TRANSACTIONAL_ACCOUNTS
description: Transactional Accounts

name: TRANS_HISTORY_RANGE
description: Set Transaction History Date Range Limit

name: ADMIN_DEACTIVATION
description: The number of days after last login for an admin user to be deactivated

name: STOP-CHEQUE
description: Charge to be displayed for stop cheque request

name: DRAFT-REQUEST
description: Charge to be displayed for draft request

name: CURRENT_LENDING_RATE
description: Lending Rate
